title: Mastering ChatGPT: From Prompt Crafting to Contextual Mastery
description: Provides a structured progression from foundational skills in prompt engineering to advanced techniques like context layering. Features an 8-hour roadmap with explicit time blocks, ensuring a comprehensive learning experience. Includes hands-on exercises with specific ChatGPT tools, focusing on real-world applications. Offers detailed exercises on advanced topics, enhancing technical depth. Suggests improvements with specific examples using ChatGPT functionalities and feedback loops for prompt evaluation.
